original_text: The cherubs must look towards each other and watch over the lid. Their wings must touch each other over the top of the lid.
korean_text: 그룹들은 그 날개를 높이 펴서 그 날개로 속죄소를 덮으며 그 얼굴을 서로 대하여 속죄소를 향하게 하고

sentences.original_text: The cherubs must look towards each other
Their wings must touch each other
over the top of the lid
